price: 11. Therefore We covered up their (sense of) hearing (causing them to go in deep sleep) in the Cave for a number of years.
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
